title: Calculate Asset Depreciation Schedule
description: An accountant for a farm needs to calculate the annual depreciation for a new tractor for tax purposes.

tasks.description: Retrieve the asset's purchase price, purchase date, and asset class.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the necessary details for the tractor.

tasks.description: Select the appropriate depreciation method (e.g., straight-line, MACRS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the MACRS method as is standard for farm equipment.

tasks.description: Calculate and generate the full depreciation schedule for the life of the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a table showing the annual depreciation expense.
